title: Redeem Loyalty Points for Stay
description: A loyalty program member wants to book a room using their points.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's loyalty account and check their points balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the customer has enough points for a free night.

tasks.description: Check for award night availability for the customer's desired dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms a standard room is available for a points redemption.

tasks.description: Create the reservation using points and confirm the booking with the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the award stay and deducts the points.
